allow: Bash(# Create app images from Salus logo convert ref/images/salus.png -resize 175x175 -gravity center -background white -extent 250x175 assets/images/small.png convert ref/images/salus.png -resize 350x350 -gravity center -background white -extent 500x350 assets/images/large.png convert ref/images/salus.png -resize 700x700 -gravity center -background white -extent 1000x700 assets/images/xlarge.png ls -la assets/images/*.png && identify assets/images/*.png)
